Uses of Class
org.apache.log4j.Priority

Packages that use Priority
org.apache.log4j The main log4j package. 
org.apache.log4j.pattern Provides classes implementing format specifiers in conversion patterns. 
org.apache.log4j.spi Contains part of the System Programming Interface (SPI) needed to extend log4j. 
 

Uses of Priority in org.apache.log4j
 

Subclasses of Priority in org.apache.log4j
 class Level
          Defines the minimum set of levels recognized by the system, that is OFF, FATAL, ERROR, WARN, INFODEBUG and ALL.

Fields in org.apache.log4j.pattern declared as Priority
 Priority LogEvent.level
          Deprecated. This field will be marked as private in future releases. Please do not access it directly. Use the LogEvent.getLevel() method instead.
